faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services
faq.question1: How quickly will you respond to my inquiry?
faq.answer1: We guarantee a response within 5 minutes during business hours. Our team is committed to providing prompt and helpful assistance.
faq.answer2: Yes! We offer free initial consultations for all our services. This gives you the opportunity to discuss your needs and learn how we can help.
faq.question3: What areas of Berlin do you cover?
faq.answer3: We cover all areas of Berlin, including Prenzlauer Berg, Charlottenburg, Kreuzberg, Mitte, Friedrichshain, and many more neighborhoods.
faq.question4: Can you help with property financing?
faq.answer4: While we don't provide financing directly, we work with trusted financial partners and can guide you through the financing process.
